description:
FIR (Finite Impulse Response) filter for array processing layer.

# Internal Type Used in **array processing layer** for installer-configurable linear-phase filtering. Path: `/audio/output/speaker/1/array/fir`

# Purpose Installer-loaded FIR filters for array tuning. Typically used for: - Speaker voicing/tuning - Room acoustic correction - Phase alignment in multi-cabinet arrays

# Structure - `bypass`: Enable/disable FIR filter - `taps`: FIR coefficient array (float32, max 64 taps)

# Tap Validation `PresetFirTaps` validates: - Maximum 64 taps - Valid float values (no NaN/Inf) - Empty array allowed (no filtering)

taps.description: FIR filter coefficients (max 64 taps, float32 array)
